::Zardus::

Zardus is about to reply when Orchestra mentions the Infecticons, one of Zardus's eyebrows raising slightly. He considers it for several seconds before replying.

"I do have a meeting coming up with the Infecticons, yes," he says after a little while, "Does Darkfate have dealings with them?"



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Abyssian Badass" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> ::Orchestra::
> 
> Orchestra had shaken off the whole brother thing for now.
> 
> "Well, to be honest, I'm not sure.  I never was told Darkfate's reasons for
> me to come here.  But anyway, do you still wish to remain at peace with us?
> Oh, and are you considering an alliance with the Infectrons?" Orchestra
> asked.
